Package components

Class Board

java.lang.Object
components.Board
public class Board extends Object
this implements board class which has the board and can return what is on there as well as executing moves
Author:
jason dao, ryan coslove

  • Method Details

    • getPiece

      public Piece getPiece(int a, int b)
      return piece based on coordinate
      Parameters:
      a - int x coordinate
      b - int y coordinate
      Returns:
      piece, null if no piece on that space

    • valid

      public boolean valid(int a, int b)
      check to see if x coordinate and y coordinate are in bound
      Parameters:
      a - x coordinate
      b - y coordinate
      Returns:
      boolean

    • getPieceInfo

      public String[] getPieceInfo(int a, int b)
      Parameters:
      a - int of x coordinate on board
      b - int of y coodinate on board
      Returns:
      String array of info of piece based on coordinates (what type it is or color), if no piece return null

    • checkPieceInfo

      public boolean checkPieceInfo(String[] a, String[] b)
      uses string array[], compares two pieces on what type, color it is
      Parameters:
      a - string array of piece 1
      b - string array of piece 2
      Returns:
      boolean if equal or not

    • getTurn

      public void getTurn()
      gives to class whose turn it is and what the respective string is

    • isSpaceValid

      public boolean isSpaceValid(int[] num)
      checks to see if final space is movable to (universal across all pieces)
      1. You can move to any empty space
      2. You can move to place that your color is not occupying
      Parameters:
      num - array of current piece (first two indexes), and destination place (final two indexes)
      Returns:
      boolean to see if final space is valid to move to

    • isCurrentCorrect

      public boolean isCurrentCorrect(int[] num)
      checks to see if current piece can be moved (universal across all pieces)
      1. You cannot move from a place with no piece
      2. You cannot move other person's piece
      Parameters:
      num - array of current piece (first two indexes), and destination place (final two indexes)
      Returns:
      boolean to see if current piece is valid to move

    • execute

      public Piece[][] execute(int[] num, int numm)
      this executes the move, moving piece and getting rid of old piece if there
      Parameters:
      num - array , 4 spaces x,y of moving piece, x,y of destination
      numm - 1 if normal move, 2 if castling,3 if enpassant,4 if promotion
      Returns:
      Piece [][]

    • error

      public void error()
      print error message

    • enPassantClear

      public void enPassantClear()
      if piece after enpassant has not been touched remove flag of it

    • printBoard

      public void printBoard()
      prints board
